verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> for the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>. It is a good <S%H2896><s%> thing to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and to sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O most High <S%H5945><s%>:
To shew forth <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> every night <S%H3915><s%>,
Upon an instrument of ten strings <S%H6218><s%>, and upon the psaltery <S%H5035><s%>; upon the harp <S%H3658><s%> with a solemn sound <S%H1902><s%>.

For thou, YY <S%H3068><s%>, hast made me glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8765><s%> through thy work <S%H6467><s%>: I will triumph <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the works <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands <S%H3027><s%>.
O YY <S%H3068><s%>, how great <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8804><s%> are thy works <S%H4639><s%> ! and thy thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are very <S%H3966><s%> deep <S%H6009><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
A brutish <S%H1198><s%> man <S%H376><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not; neither doth a fool <S%H3684><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this.

When the wicked <S%H7563><s%> spring <S%H6524><s%> <S%H8800><s%> as the grass <S%H6212><s%>, and when all the workers <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> do flourish <S%H6692><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; it is that they shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8736><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>:
But thou, YY <S%H3068><s%>, art most high <S%H4791><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.

For, lo, thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, for, lo, thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; all the workers <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> shall be scattered <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8691><s%>.

But my shofar <S%H7161><s%> shalt thou exalt <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> like the shofar of an unicorn <S%H7214><s%>: I shall be anointed <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with fresh <S%H7488><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.

Mine eye <S%H5869><s%> also shall see <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my desire on mine enemies <S%H7790><s%>, and mine ears <S%H241><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my desire of the wicked <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8688><s%> that rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8801><s%> against me.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like the palm tree <S%H8558><s%>: he shall grow <S%H7685><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like a cedar <S%H730><s%> in Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

Those that be planted <S%H8362><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
They shall still bring forth fruit <S%H5107><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in old age <S%H7872><s%>; they shall be fat <S%H1879><s%> and flourishing <S%H7488><s%>;
To shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> is upright <S%H3477><s%>: he is my rock <S%H6697><s%>, and there is no unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5766><s%> in him.
